EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI Luncheon_Q414.03 Confirmation - Sydney (25th Nov)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Registering: FSI Executive Luncheon Series - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for registering for our Pivotal Financial Services and Insurance Executive Luncheon.
Please find below the details for the event.
Sydney: Date: Wednesday 26th November 2014 Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start â€“ 2.30pm Location: Prime Address: GPO Sydney, No.1 Martin Place, Sydney <https://www.google.com.au/maps/place/GPO+Sydney+%7C+Restaurants+and+Bars/@-33.868167,151.207632,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x6b12ae67d5fed25b:0x8b4a5174e7c0cb79>
Click here to add to your calendar: Save the Date <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/FSI%20-%20Executive%20Luncheon%20Series%20%28Sydney%29.ics>
We look forward to seeing you there.
The Pivotal Team
